articles.title: Alabama sees 3,531 new COVID-19 cases Thursday - WSFA
articles.description: While that didn’t beat the record of 3,928 set the day before, it is the third straight day in which the state has topped at least 3,000 cases.
articles.content: MONTGOMERY, Ala. (WSFA) - The Alabama Department of Public Health reported 3,531 new or probable cases of COVID-19 on Thursday. While that didnt beat the record of 3,928 set the day before, it is the… [+3029 chars]
